abstract.description: A text object containing a short textual description of the resource.

categories.description: An array of category strings identifying the types instantiated by the resource.

description.description: A text object containing the complete textual description of the resource.

name.description: A text object containing the complete name of the resource.

shortName.description: A text object containing a short name of the resource.

url.description: A url string or a multilingual url object containing language-specific url strings.

basicMeta.description: An object containing metadata of the resource (e.g., the URL representing the resource's data provider or a date-time string of the instant of the resource's last update).

dataProvider.description: A url string that identifies the organization responsible for the data about a resource and who can be contacted in case of questions or issues regarding it.

lastUpdate.description: A date-time string that identifies when a resource was last modified in the server.

links.description: An object containing the links related to access related resources (e.g., a link to the agent resources representing organizers and sponsors of an event, a link to the media object resources representing multimedia descriptions of a mountain area resource, or a link to the resource itself, also referred to as `self`).

address.description: An object that represents an address.

contactPoints.description: A contact point array contains data that one can use to contact an agent resource.

geometry.description: The representation of geographic data structures in this standard is borrowed from the GeoJSON standard specification.

geometryPoint.description: The coordinates member is a single position.

geometryMultiPoint.description: The coordinates member is an array of positions.

geometryLineString.description: The coordinates member is an array of two or more positions.

geometryMultiLineString.description: The coordinates member is an array of LineString coordinate arrays.

geometryPolygon.description: The coordinates member is an array different coordinate arrays forming a polygon.

geometryMultiPolygon.description: The coordinates member is an array of Polygon coordinate arrays

snowCondition.description: A snow condition object allows the representation of the conditions of a trail, snowpark or a mountain area at a given moment in time.

text.description: An object that allows exchange of textual data (e.g. name, description) using multiple languages.

hoursSpecifications.description: An hours specification object allows the representations of schedules over periods of time.

trails.description: A resource representing a trail, a physical path that supports the practice of some type of sport activity.

type.description: A string that identifies the resource's type.

id.description: A string that uniquely and persistently identifies the resource within a server.

address.description: An address object representing the address of the trail.

difficulty.description: An object containing the difficulty level of a ski slope.

geometries.description: An array of geometry objects each of which represents the location of the trail in terms of GPS coordinates.

howToArrive.description: A text object containing instructions on how to arrive at the trail.

length.description: A number representing the length of the trail in meters.

maxAltitude.description: A number representing the highest elevation point of the trail in meters above sea level.

minAltitude.description: A number representing the lowest elevation point of the trail in meters above sea level.

openingHours.description: An array of hours specification objects representing the hours in which the trail is open to the public.

snowCondition.description: A snow condition object containing the latest reported condition of the snow in the trail.

relationships.description: An object containing the resource's data referring to other resources (e.g. the organizers of an event, the trails within a mountain area).

connections.description: An object representing references to place resources that identify the places that are physically accessible from the trail, which may include mountain areas, other lifts, snowparks, and trails.

multimediaDescriptions.description: An object representing a reference towards media objects that describe the trail.

lifts.description: A resource representing a lift, a machine designed to transport people uphill, being often used to transport skiers in mountain areas.

type.description: A string that identifies the resource's type.

id.description: A string that uniquely and persistently identifies the resource within a server.

address.description: An address object representing the address of the lift.

capacity.description: A number representing how many persons the lift can transport hourly on average.

geometries.description: An array of geometry objects each of which represents the location of the lift in terms of GPS coordinates.

howToArrive.description: A text object containing instructions on how to arrive at the lift.

length.description: A number representing the length of the lift in meters.

maxAltitude.description: A number representing the highest elevation point of the lift in meters above sea level.

minAltitude.description: A number representing the lowest elevation point of the lift in meters above sea level.

openingHours.description: An array of hours specification objects representing the hours in which the lift is open to the public.

personsPerChair.description: An integer representing the number of persons that fit in a single chair/cabin of a lift.

relationships.description: An object containing the resource's data referring to other resources (e.g. the organizers of an event, the trails within a mountain area).

connections.description: An object representing references to place resources that identify the places that are physically accessible from the lift, which may include mountain areas, other lifts, snowparks, and trails.

multimediaDescriptions.description: An object representing a reference towards media objects that describe the lifts.

mediaObjects.description: A resource representing an object that materializes creative works into a digital format to enable processing and sharing.

type.description: A string that identifies the resource's type.

id.description: A string that uniquely and persistently identifies the resource within a server.

contentType.description: A string that represents the media type (formerly known as MIME type) of the media object.

duration.description: A number representing the duration of an audio or a video in seconds.

height.description: A number representing the height of an image or a video in pixels.

license.description: A string that represents the license applied to the media object.

width.description: A number representing the width of an image or a video in pixels.

relationships.description: An object containing the resource's data referring to other resources (e.g. the organizers of an event, the trails within a mountain area).

copyrightOwner.description: An object representing a reference towards an agent resource who owns the rights over the media object.

mountainAreas.description: A resource representing a mountain area, a geographical region in which alpine sports and activities can be performed, such as skiing, snowboarding, climbing, and hiking.

type.description: A string that identifies the resource's type.

id.description: A string that uniquely and persistently identifies the resource within a server.

area.description: A number representing the total area, in square meters, of the mountain area.

geometries.description: An array of geometry objects each of which represents the location of the mountain area in terms of GPS coordinates.

howToArrive.description: A text object containing instructions on how to arrive at the mountain area.

maxAltitude.description: A number representing the highest elevation point of the mountain area in meters above sea level.

minAltitude.description: A number representing the lowest elevation point of the mountain area in meters above sea level.

openingHours.description: An array of hours specification objects representing the hours in which the mountain area is open to the public.

snowCondition.description: A snow condition object containing the latest reported condition of the snow in the mountain area.

totalParkLength.description: An integer representing the total length, in meters, of all snowparks located within the mountain area.

totalTrailLength.description: An integer representing the total length, in meters, of all trails located within the mountain area.

relationships.description: An object containing the resource's data referring to other resources (e.g. the organizers of an event, the trails within a mountain area).

areaOwner.description: An object representing references to an agent resource who owns the mountain area.

connections.description: An object representing references to place resources that identify the places that are physically accessible from the mountain area, which may include mountain areas, other lifts, snowparks, and trails.

lifts.description: An object representing references to lift resources that identify the lifts located within the mountain area.

multimediaDescriptions.description: An object representing a reference towards media objects that describe the mountain area.

snowparks.description: An object representing references to snowpark resources that identify the snowparks located within the mountain area.

subAreas.description: An object representing references to mountain area resources that identify the mountain areas located within the mountain area.

trails.description: An object representing references to trail resources that identify the trails located within the mountain area.

snowparks.description: A resource representing a snowpark, a particular type of trail that is designed to allow skiers and snowboarders to perform free-style tricks by providing them with special features, such as jumps and rails.

type.description: A string that identifies the resource's type.

id.description: A string that uniquely and persistently identifies the resource within a server.

address.description: An address object representing the address of the snowpark.

difficulty.description: A string describing the difficulty level of a snowpark.

features.description: An array of category strings that informs the types of features available within the snowpark, such as a jump or a rail.

geometries.description: An array of geometry objects each of which represents the location of the snowpark in terms of GPS coordinates.

howToArrive.description: A text object containing instructions on how to arrive at the snowpark.

length.description: A number representing the length of the snowpark in meters.

maxAltitude.description: A number representing the highest elevation point of the snowpark in meters above sea level.

minAltitude.description: A number representing the lowest elevation point of the snowpark in meters above sea level.

openingHours.description: An array of hours specification objects representing the hours in which the snowpark is open to the public.

snowCondition.description: A snow condition object containing the latest reported condition of the snow in the snowpark.

relationships.description: An object containing the resource's data referring to other resources (e.g. the organizers of an event, the trails within a mountain area).

connections.description: An object representing references to place resources that identify the places that are physically accessible from the snowpark, which may include mountain areas, other lifts, snowparks, and trails.

multimediaDescriptions.description: An object representing a reference towards media objects that describe the snowpark.
